page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content:
Most people who live in the area own their own homes, although there is a large council estate at Penwithick.
The cost of a house depends on its exact location; those nearer St. Austell are usually more expensive. At Yondertown, it is possible to buy a detached 3-bedroom house, with bathroom, separate indoor toilet, outbuildings, large garden and garage for just under 24,000 pounds; a similar residence nearer St.Austell would be over 30,000 pounds.
Nearly all newly-built houses have central heating, either gas or electricity, and indoor bathrooms and toilets. However, there are still some old cottages which lack facilites and have an outside toilet at the bottom of the garden.
